author: SciShow
description:
Use code scishow at https://incogni.com/scishow to get an exclusive 60% off.   

For centuries, Europeans were obsessed with Chinese porcelain but couldn't figure out the secret recipe for it. So a French priest traveled there to steal it. 

Hosted by: Madelyn Leembruggen

title: The Priest Who Stole China's Biggest Secret
